conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect score for dimensional transformation and clean cutaway geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Extremely faithful floor plan reproduction. Staircase, pantry, and room adjacencies are highly accurate. Minor simplification of some window mullions.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry, stove island, fireplace, and bathroom fixtures are correctly placed according to the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean aesthetic with consistent materials; no UI clutter or broken meshes.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of window panels/mullions compared to specific architectural symbols.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D isometric conversion that accurately translates complex floor plan geometry into a readable model.
